sys_script.name: Update Current Bid Amount

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_e0db52aa9392021094e3f15a7bba1012
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383184_charityb_bid</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Current Bid Amount</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
    if (current.your_bid_amount.changes()) {
        var ga = new GlideAjax('BidUtils');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'validateyourBidAmount');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_item_name.number', current.item_name.id.toString());
        ga.addParam('sysparm_your_bid_amount', current.your_bid_amount.toString());
        var isValid = ga.getXMLWait(); // Synchronously call GlideAjax
        if (isValid == 'invalid') {
            current.your_bid_amount.setError('Your bid amount must be greater than the current bid amount.');
        }
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-24 06:47:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e0db52aa9392021094e3f15a7bba1012</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Current Bid Amount</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e0db52aa9392021094e3f15a7bba1012</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-24 08:23:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e0db52aa9392021094e3f15a7bba1012"/></record_update>
